title: Writing with React
body: It is no suprise that many people struggles with writing React. While it is similar to what we have done in the past, it the front-end part is a bit harder to understand.

title: The Benefits of a Bootcamp
body: While college degrees are amazing, bootcamps are by and large, the more affordable option. The question remains to be seen of is a bootcamp certification still valued in the work place?
